name: Suppose
description:
The game puts you in a hypothetical situation - a situation that you don't know. How will you be able to adapt to a situation where your senses are limited?

===Controls===

Left and Right Arrow Keys - Move Left and Right

Up Arrow Key - Jump

Z - Move Onto Next Level (After Reaching the Goal)

Mouse Left Click - Draw on the screen

Mouse Right Click - Erase the screen

== Known Issues==

Drawing will not happen in the right place if the window is resized or if window scaling is not 100%

==Credits==

Michael Roskuski - Creator, Lead Programmer
